sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndtausestats ( DTA_USE_STATS_ID , bbs_id , ntt_id , atch_file_id , file_sn , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm ) VALUES ( #dtaUseStatsId# , #bbsId# , #nttId# , #atchFileId# , #fileSn# , #frstRegisterId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndtausestats SET dta_use_stats_id = #dtaUseStatsId# , bbs_id = #bbsId# , ntt_id = #nttId# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , file_sn = #fileSn# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# WHERE dta_use_stats_id = #dtaUseStatsId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT dta_use_stats_id , bbs_id , ntt_id , atch_file_id , file_sn , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtndtausestats WHERE dta_use_stats_id = #dtaUseStatsId#

SELECT dta_use_stats_id , bbs_id , ntt_id , atch_file_id , file_sn , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtndtausestats WHERE 1=1
dta_use_stats_id = #searchKeyword#
bbs_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY dta_use_stats_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtndtausestats WHERE 1=1
dta_use_stats_id = #searchKeyword#
bbs_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
